Classes in net.usikkert.kouinject that implement ClassLocator

Constructors in net.usikkert.kouinject with parameters of type ClassLocator
AnnotationBasedBeanLocator(ClassLocator classLocator, java.lang.String... basePackages)
          Constructs a new instance of this BeanLocator using a ClassLocator for autodetecting the beans in the specified base packages.
